title: The Smash

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Smash someone at night, killing them. (2 uses)
- Throw an imp at someone. If they have Basic or higher defense (including temporary or external defense), roleblock them. Otherwise, they will be roleblocked through immunity.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune when throwing an imp.
- The first time you are attacked, kill the attacker.

desc:
Post 2584
*No need for a telephone pole with THESE arms.*
